Text: Your March OnePass Statement is Now Onlineyou for choosing to receive Continental Airlines OnePass statement communications electronically Your latest statement is now online providing a summary of your mileage activity through March To access your new statement just visit Your Account at cgibinfloyeDdDrucuBNHCOhh For a limited time fly to Hong Kong for half the miles Visit cgibinfloyeDdDrucuBNHajF for more details and other Reward sale destinations If you have any questions regarding your account please email the OnePass Service Center at mailto and make sure to include your name and OnePass number FE in your email message Sincerely Mark Bergsrud Vice President Marketing UNFORTUNATELY MAIL SENT TO THIS ADDRESS CANNOT BE ANSWERED PLEASE DIRECT ALL INQUIRIES TO mailto OAIRCOM Note To modify your OnePass email preferences please login to Your Account at cgibinfloyeDdDrucuBNHNRD To unsubscribe from all OnePass statement email programs please visit cgibinfloyeDdDrucuBNHcBBO
